title: Open Search of a Name for International Student Dormitory
content:
Open Search of a Name for International Student Dormitory

KAIST is holding an event of "Name Collecting of the International Students Dormitory" which is being jointly built by Daejeon City, Universities in Daejeon and Daejeon Expo Science Park, so we hope many KAIST professors, students and staffs will apply for this event as stated below


1. Event name : Name Collecting of the International Students Dormitory
2. Applicable Names
   o Easy and meaningful names which symbolize Daejeon, Korean tradition,         International image, etc.
   o Language mode : Korean, English, and Korean-English mixture
3. Application Period : Sep. 18(mon) through Oct. 16(mon) 5pm
4. Applicant Qualifications
   o KAIST Professors, Staffs, Researchers 
   o KAIST students(including international students)
5. Application Procedure
   o Submission by E-mail after filling out the attached form
   o Person-in-charge & E-mail address
     ➡ Choi, Yong-Ho(Tel. 4712), choiyh64@kaist.ac.kr
6. Awards
   o 5 Applicants will be selected and given KRW100,000 each
   o Most outstanding Name will be noticed to <Construction Commission>
   * Final dormitory name will be selected by <Construction Commission> 
     in October.

Attached : 1. Summary of International Students Dormitory Construction
           2. Application form 


 Vice-President of Planning & Budget  Yang, Ji-Won    
KAIST Delegate of Daejeon Int'l Students Dormitory Construction Commission
